verses.text: OFE‘I ho fofonga, ‘Eiki, ‘o tali kita; He ko e tu‘utāmaki au, mo masiva.
Tauhi hoku laumālie, he ko ho‘o pele kita: Fakamo‘ui ho‘o tamaio‘eiki, ‘a e ‘Afiona ko hoku ‘Otua; He ko e falala au ki he ‘Afiona.
‘Alo‘ofa mai, ‘Ātonai ē; He ko e ‘aho kotoa ‘oku ou tautapa kiate koe.
Fakafiefia‘i ‘a e loto ‘o ho‘o tamaio‘eiki; He ‘oku ou hapai hake hoku laumālie kiate koe, ‘Ātonai.
He ko e lelei koe, ‘Ātonai, mo e fa‘a fakamolemole, Pea ke mohu meesi ki he kakai kotoa ‘oku tautapa kiate koe.
Ongo‘i, ‘Eiki, ‘eku lotu; Pea fofonga ki he le‘o ‘o ‘eku hū tōtōaki atu.
‘I he ‘aho ‘o ‘eku faingata‘a‘ia te u tautapa atu; He te ke tali au.
‘Oku ‘ikai ha taha ‘i ha‘a ‘Otua ‘oku tatau, ‘Ātonai, mo Koe; Pea ‘oku ‘ikai ha ngāue ‘e tatau mo ho‘o ngāue.
Ko e pule‘anga kotoa kuo ke ngaohi Te nau omi ‘o punou ‘i ho ‘ao, ‘Ātonai: Pea ko ho huafa te nau fakahīkihiki‘i.
He ko e lahi ‘a e ‘Afiona, Pea mo e fai me‘a mana; Ko koe ‘a e ‘Otua toko taha.
Huluhulu au ‘i ho hala, ‘Eiki; Ka u ha‘ele ‘i ho‘o mo‘oni. Ko hoku loto ē ke ke fā‘ūtaha Ke ‘apasia ki ho huafa.
Ka u fakafeta‘i ki he ‘Afiona ‘aki hoku loto kotoa, ‘E ‘Ātonai ko hoku ‘Otua; ‘O fakahīkihiki‘i ho huafa ‘o ta‘engata.
He kuo lahi kiate au ho‘o meesi Pea kuo ke hamusi hoku laumālie mei he takele ‘o Hētesi.
Kuo tu‘u mai ha kakai pau‘u, ‘Elohimi, Pea ko e fakataha ‘a kau fakamālohi kuo nau tuli ki he‘eku mo‘ui: Pea ‘oku ‘ikai te nau fai ki he ‘Afiona ‘enau fakafeangai.
Ka ko koe, ‘Ātonai, ko e ‘Otua ‘alo‘ofa mo angalelei, Tuai ki he houhau, pea fonu ‘i he kelesi mo e mo‘oni.
Tafoki kiate au, pea ke ‘alo‘ofa; Foaki ho ivi ki ho‘o tamaio‘eiki ko kita, Pea fakamo‘ui ‘a e tama ‘a ho‘o kaunanga.
Fai ma‘aku ha faka‘ilonga monū, Ke sio ki ai pea mā ‘a kinautolu ‘oku fehi‘a kiate au, He ko koe, Sihova, kuo ke tokoni mai, ‘o fai ha fakalelu.
